statements: SELECT * FROM livestock_sales;
SELECT transaction_date, customer_name, total_price FROM livestock_sales WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, unit_price FROM livestock_sales ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_price) AS total_sales FROM livestock_sales GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, item_name FROM livestock_sales WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, item_name, quantity, total_price FROM livestock_sales WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT customer_name, item_name, total_price FROM livestock_sales WHERE unit_price > 100
SELECT transaction_date, customer_name, item_name, total_price FROM livestock_sales WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM livestock_sales WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' OR customer_name LIKE 'Smith%'
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_price) AS total_sales FROM livestock_sales GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT * FROM livestock_sales WHERE sale_price > 1000
SELECT livestock_type, quantity FROM livestock_sales WHERE sale_price < 500
SELECT sale_date, sale_price FROM livestock_sales WHERE quantity >= 10
SELECT * FROM livestock_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT livestock_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM livestock_sales GROUP BY livestock_type
SELECT * FROM livestock_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT livestock_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM livestock_sales GROUP BY livestock_type;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, livestock_type, quantity, sale_price FROM livestock_sales ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM livestock_purchases WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT livestock_type, AVG(purchase_price) AS avg_purchase_price FROM livestock_purchases GROUP BY livestock_type ORDER BY avg_purchase_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM LivestockSales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT id, livestock_type, price FROM LivestockPurchases WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, livestock_type, sale_date FROM LivestockSales WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM FinancialRecords WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT id, livestock_type, purchase_date FROM LivestockPurchases WHERE quantity = 5;
SELECT id, livestock_type, price, sale_date FROM LivestockSales WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LivestockPurchases WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT livestock_type, SUM(price) AS total_sales FROM LivestockSales GROUP BY livestock_type HAVING total_sales > 5000;
SELECT transaction_type, COUNT(id) AS transaction_count FROM FinancialRecords WHERE amount < 0 GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT id, livestock_type, purchase_date FROM LivestockPurchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Livestock;
SELECT name, age FROM Livestock WHERE breed = 'Angus';
SELECT id, price FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT summary_id, date, net_income FROM FinancialSummary WHERE total_sales > total_purchases;
SELECT name, age, breed FROM Livestock WHERE age > 5 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT sale_date, sale_price FROM Sales WHERE sale_price > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Livestock WHERE breed = 'Angus' AND price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT purchase_date, purchase_price FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_price < 500 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT summary_id, date, net_income FROM FinancialSummary WHERE total_sales > total_purchases ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM Livestock;
SELECT livestock_id, livestock_name, price FROM Livestock WHERE species='Cow';
SELECT livestock_id, livestock_name, age, price FROM Livestock WHERE age > 5 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT livestock_id, livestock_name, species, price FROM Livestock WHERE price < 1000 ORDER BY species DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT livestock_name, species, age FROM Livestock WHERE price >= 1000 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, address FROM Customers WHERE LENGTH(address) > 10 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT sale_date, quantity, total_price FROM Sales WHERE total_price <= 500 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number, address FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY supplier_name
SELECT livestock_name, species, price FROM Livestock WHERE species = 'Cow' AND price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY price
